IT'S OVER

I used the phyrigian scale (one of my favorite ones currently) for the very first time here. I Inmediately fell in love with the scale after producing this song. Regarding the vibe, I made it sort of agressive with a Cyberpunkish and 80s style (I'll be creating more stuff like this!)
